overview:
Eric is an accomplished online creative professional with over 10 years experience with Fortune 500 firms and global brands in a variety of industries. Prior to joining SellPoint, Eric managed web production for NORCAL Insurance, where he led collaborative efforts with cross functional teams to produce online applications and advertising campaigns.

Previously, Eric worked on a series of contract assignments, including projects for HBO (Home Box Office) & No Fear, for which he received the esteemed Communication Arts â€œWebsite of the Weekâ€ award in November, 2000. Eric also co-owned and founded Intervelop, a successful web design & development firm as well as Baxter & Lewis, a full-service creative services firm with a roster of over 30 clients. Eric holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Marketing from San Diego State University.
